title: Fight Club
description: A ticking‑time‑bomb insomniac and a soap salesman form an underground fight club.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder who has a mysterious gift.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and more through the eyes of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Inception
description: A thief steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology but gets a chance at redemption if he can plant an idea instead of stealing one.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Maverick Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot.
